title: Bootmanager/Tool for CD images on HDD with auto-menu

forumNotes.author: MedEvil
forumNotes.content:
I'm looking for a bootmanager / tool to boot CD-images of a HDD.  

I know there are a few bootmanagers that can do that, but they all require explicit menu entries for each CD.  

I'm looking for a simpler (automatic) solution.   

I just want to drop a wagonload of CDs into a folder and have the bootmanager / tool present them to me as a boot option, without any manual configuration.  

Any tips?
